item.description:
The PrimateCast #43: Conservation Voices with Great Ape Conservationist Jef Dupain

On this first episode in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), great ape conservationist Jef Dupain shares his vision and missions as the Technical Director for Central and Western Africa of the

item.title: The PrimateCast #44: An Interview with Dr. Lori Sheeran & Dr. Steve Wagner
item.description:
The PrimateCast #44: An Interview with Dr. Lori Sheeran & Dr. Steve Wagner

Ellensburg, Washington - The Valley of the Wild Monkeys, China - and Kyoto University. How are they all connected? In this episode, we chat with Drs Lori Sheeran and Steve Wagner of Central Washington

item.title: The PrimateCast #45: An Interview with Dr. Ralph Adolphs
item.description:
The PrimateCast #45: An Interview with Dr. Ralph Adolphs

The PrimateCast interviews Dr. Ralph Adolphs about emotion, the social brain, and the approaches he and his lab are using to understand these phenomena. Dr. Ralph Adolphs is Bren Professor of Psychology and Neuroscience and Professor of Biology at the California Institute of Technology.
